snippet: The selection of Jordan Spieth, 20, came at the expense of Jim Furyk, 43, who has been on every team at the biennial event since 1997.
abstract: United States golf team captain Fred Couples chooses 20-year-old Jordan Spieth to play  Presidents Cup over 43-year-old Jim Furyk, who has been on every team at the biennial event since 1997; Spieth will become the first tour rookie from the US to play in the Presidents Cup and the second-youngest participant in the event’s history.
lead_paragraph: The selection of Jordan Spieth, 20, came at the expense of Jim Furyk, 43, who has been on every team at the biennial event since 1997.

headline.main: Couples Opts for Youth in the Presidents Cup
headline.print_headline: Couples Opts for Youth In the Presidents Cup
